languages.text:
Whenever the wearer deals damage with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} to an enemy, that enemy must pass a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or die immediately. If passed, they suffer an additional +<u>AGI {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}.
All enemies of {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} VI or above are immune to this effect.

traits.locale_text:
Whenever the wearer deals damage qith {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attacks{/g} to an enemy, that enemy must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance test or die immediately. If passed, they suffer an additional +<u>AGI bonus</u> direct damage.
All enemies of difficulty tier VI or above are immune to this effect.

Whenever the wearer deals damage with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} to an enemy, that enemy must pass a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or die immediately. If passed, they suffer an additional +<u>AGI {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}.
All enemies of {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} VI or above are immune to this effect.

Whenever the wearer deals damage with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} to an enemy, that enemy must pass a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or die immediately. If passed, they suffer an additional +<u>AGI {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}.
All enemies of {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} VI or above are immune to this effect.

languages.text:
每当装备者对目标造成{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，该目标必须通过{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，否则会立刻死亡。若目标通过检定，则会承受额外{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}，等同于装备者的<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>。
所有{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}为VI级或以上的敌人免疫此{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} to an enemy, that enemy must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or die immediately. If passed, they suffer an additional +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}.
All enemies of {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} VI or above are immune to this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
每当装备者对目标造成{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战攻击{/g}伤害时，该目标必须通过{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，否则会立刻死亡。若目标通过检定，则会承受额外直击伤害，等同于装备者的<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>。
所有{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}为VI级或以上的敌人免疫此{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}。

languages.text:
Получая урон от персонажа в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, противник выполняет {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} Выносливости на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала немедленно погибает. В случае успеха цель получает +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ЛВК</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого урона{/g} дополнительно.
Противники, чей {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранг{/g} выше или равен VI, обладают иммунитетом к этому эффекту.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer deals damage qith {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attacks{/g} to an enemy, that enemy must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance test or die immediately. If passed, they suffer an additional +<u>AGI bonus</u> direct damage.
All enemies of difficulty tier VI or above are immune to this effect.

traits.locale_text:
Получая урон от персонажа в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ближнем бою{/g}, противник выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала немедленно погибает. В случае успеха цель получает +<u>бонус ЛВК</u> прямого урона дополнительно.
Противники, чей ранг выше или равен IV, обладают иммунитетом к этому эффекту.

Получая урон от персонажа в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ближнем бою{/g}, противник выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала немедленно погибает. В случае успеха цель получает +<u>бонус ЛВК</u> прямого урона дополнительно.
Противники, чей ранг выше или равен IV, обладают иммунитетом к этому эффекту.

languages.text:
使用者が敵に{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えるたびに、その敵は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に合格するか、直ちに死ぬ。合格すると、敵は<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>分の{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}を追加で受ける。
{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}難易度{/g}VI以上の敵はすべてこの{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を受けない。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} to an enemy, that enemy must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or die immediately. If passed, they suffer an additional +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}.
All enemies of {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} VI or above are immune to this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
使用者が敵に{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}でダメージを与えると、その敵は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に合格しなければ直ちに死ぬ。合格すると、敵は<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>分の直接ダメージを追加で受ける。
{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}難易度{/g}VI以上の敵はすべてこの{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}を受けない。

languages.text:
Cada vez que el portador cause daño con {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} a un enemigo, dicho enemigo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} o morirá de inmediato. Si la supera, sufre +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} de </u> {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g} adicional.
Todos los enemigos de {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} VI o superior son inmunes a este efecto.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer deals damage with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} to an enemy, that enemy must pass a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or die immediately. If passed, they suffer an additional +<u>AGI {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}.
All enemies of {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} VI or above are immune to this effect.

traits.locale_text:
Cada vez que el portador cause daño con {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} a un enemigo, dicho enemigo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} o morirá de inmediato. Si la supera, sufre +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} de </u> daño directo adicional.
Todos los enemigos de {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} VI o superior son inmunes a este {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g}.

languages.text:
Wenn der Träger bei einem Feind {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} verursacht, muss dieser Feind eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeits{/g}-Widerstands{g|Encyclopedia:Test}probe{/g} bestehen, um nicht sofort zu sterben. Gelingt die Probe, erleidet der Feind zusätzlich +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}BEW{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g}.
Alle Feinde der {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g} VI oder höher sind immun gegen diesen {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer deals damage with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} to an enemy, that enemy must pass a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or die immediately. If passed, they suffer an additional +<u>AGI {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}.
All enemies of {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} VI or above are immune to this effect.

traits.locale_text:
Immer wenn der Träger bei einem Feind Schaden mit {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriffen{/g} verursacht, muss dieser Feind eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeits{/g}-Widerstands{g|Encyclopedia:Test}probe{/g} bestehen oder sofort sterben. Bei Bestehen erleidet er zusätzlich +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}BEW{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}</u> Direktschaden.
Alle Feinde der {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g} VI oder höher sind immun gegen diesen {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g}.

languages.text:
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur inflige des dégâts à un ennemi avec une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g}, cet ennemi doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}résistance{/g} d'Endurance, faute de quoi il meurt instantanément. S'il réussit ce test, il subit +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus d'AGI{/g}</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g} supplémentaires.
Tous les ennemis de niveau de {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulté VI{/g} ou supérieur sont invulnérables à cet effet.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer deals damage with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} to an enemy, that enemy must pass a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or die immediately. If passed, they suffer an additional +<u>AGI {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}.
All enemies of {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} VI or above are immune to this effect.

traits.locale_text:
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur inflige des dégâts à un ennemi avec une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaque de mêlée{/g}, cet ennemi doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g}, faute de quoi il meurt instantanément. S'il réussit ce test, il subit +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}</u> points de dégâts directs supplémentaires.
Tous les ennemis de {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} VI ou supérieur sont invulnérables à cet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g}.

Chaque fois que l'utilisateur inflige des dégâts à un ennemi avec une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaque de mêlée{/g}, cet ennemi doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g}, faute de quoi il meurt instantanément. S'il réussit ce test, il subit +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}</u> points de dégâts directs supplémentaires.
Tous les ennemis de {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} VI ou supérieur sont invulnérables à cet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g}.

languages.text:
Whenever the wearer deals damage with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} to an enemy, that enemy must pass a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or die immediately. If passed, they suffer an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}.
All enemies of {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} VI or above are immune to this effect.

traits.locale_text:
Whenever the wearer deals damage with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} to an enemy, that enemy must pass a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or die immediately. If passed, they suffer an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}.
All enemies of {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} VI or above are immune to this effect.

languages.text:
Takan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g} ile bir düşmana hasar verdiğinde o düşman bir Dayanıklılık {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde anında ölür. Testi geçerse +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} ilave {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}doğrudan hasara{/g} maruz kalır.
VI veya üstü {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}zorluk derecesine{/g} sahip düşmanlar, bu etkiye karşı bağışıktır.

Whenever the wearer deals damage with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} to an enemy, that enemy must pass a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or die immediately. If passed, they suffer an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}.
All enemies of {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} VI or above are immune to this effect.
